actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Antenna [Cast, Touch (metal Object)]: Rust Touch
Bite [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Rust Touch: Non-Relic metal Items that make contact with it corrode. When this happens, roll a d6 for each Item. On a roll of 1, the Item breaks. If the Item that breaks is larger than Medium, this destroys a 1-foot square hole that is 1-foot deep in it.
